FILE: cm325375v11.0.txt
DYAD: Italy - Finland

PS: 19171206-19430902 0.5 20040501-20209999 1.00

PS-UPDATE2020:

PSNOTES: MID data, along with Gibler 2018, shows Italy and Finland on opposite sides of MID258. Unclear whether this dispute belongs here. Added 08-2018.

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20220301
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20220301

WWII MIDs: MID258 

SOURCES:
Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
